default.$description: Default interaction emphasis theme identifier. Referenced by components to apply standard interaction emphasis colors for buttons and interactive elements.

muted.$description: Muted interaction emphasis theme identifier. Referenced by components to apply subdued interaction emphasis colors for secondary or contextual interactive elements.

default.$description: Default inversity theme identifier. Referenced by components to apply normal contrast polarity.

inverse.$description: Inverse inversity theme identifier. Referenced by components to apply inverted contrast polarity for emphasis.

interaction-emphasis.$description: Footer uses muted interaction emphasis theme override

We on purpose lower the interaction emphasis of all buttons inside Infobox and use the muted colors defined in semantics/colors/interaction-emphasis/muted. This token can not be used in Figma due to Figma restrictions. In this case, the token is static and does not react to dark/light mode.
Popover uses muted interaction emphasis theme override
